meanings.definition: A title or brief explanation accompanying an illustration or photograph.
meanings.sent1: The caption under the photo described what was happening.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover had a caption that explained the main story.
meanings.sent3: The caption on the picture made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her caption was like a window into the scene captured in the photograph.
meanings.sent5: The caption was so clear, it felt like you were there in the moment.

meanings.definition: To provide a caption for a picture or image.
meanings.sent1: She will caption the image before posting it online.
meanings.sent2: Please caption this photo before sharing it on social media.
meanings.sent3: He always captions his pictures with funny quotes.
meanings.sent4: Captioning the image added context to its meaning.
meanings.sent5: Remember to caption the picture so viewers understand its significance.
